channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Discarded black wheelie bin, 4th August
item.description:
On the corner of Arle gardens and alstone lane outside 125 alstone lane. Rubbish and a black wheelie bin have been discarded for a week it is now being blown around the street in the high winds.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Arle Gardens, Wymans Brook, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Popular footpath is blocked by 6ft maize, 4th August
item.description:
Two fields of maize has made path impassable. The height of the crop and density means one cannot follow the path and is blocked in two fields.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rushley Lane, Winchcombe, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Birch tree is dead outside 43 Loweswater road on narrow grass verge along Loweswater Road. Branches are falling off onto pavement and road., 4th August
item.description:
Location: 43 Loweswater Road GL51 3AZ - narrow Hedge/ verge between pavement and main road Issue:Birch tree is dead outside 43 Loweswater Road on narrow grass verge along Loweswater Road. Branches are falling off onto pavement and road. And 43 Loweswater Road House. Tree now started to move ground with pavement having cracked and shifting the ground causing crack in adjacent garden wall.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 43, Loweswater Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
